# 《缘梦项目笔记》——网赚掘金实操项目电子书 20200130

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/yuanmeng-xiangmu-biji-wangzhuan-juejin-shicao-xiangmu-dianzishu-20200130
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/yuanmeng-xiangmu-biji-wangzhuan-juejin-shicao-xiangmu-dianzishu-20200130
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install yuanmeng-xiangmu-biji-wangzhuan-juejin-shicao-xiangmu-dianzishu-20200130
yuanmeng-xiangmu-biji-wangzhuan-juejin-shicao-xiangmu-dianzishu-20200130 <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g yuanmeng-xiangmu-biji-wangzhuan-juejin-shicao-xiangmu-dianzishu-erlingerlinglingyisanling
yuanmeng-xiangmu-biji-wangzhuan-juejin-shicao-xiangmu-dianzishu-erlingerlinglingyisanling <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
